entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
